metadata.Title: CVE-2010-4207 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Flash componentinfrastructure in YUI 2.4.0 through 2.8.1, as used in Bugzilla, Moodle, andother products, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script orHTML via vectors related to charts/assets/charts.swf.

criterions.comment: loggerhead package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
